huxtable.blur

Class UnsharpFilter

  • java.lang.Object
    • huxtable.blur.AbstractBufferedImageOp
      • huxtable.blur.ConvolveFilter
        • huxtable.blur.GaussianFilter
          • huxtable.blur.UnsharpFilter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.BufferedImageOp

    public class UnsharpFilter
extends GaussianFilter
    A filter which subtracts Gaussian blur from an image, sharpening it.
    Author:
    Jerry Huxtable
